text: Tini suryake diptimaya o camdake alokamaya karechena ebam tara jan'ya manayila nirdista karechena yate tomara bachara ganana o samayera hisaba janate para. Allahâ€Œ eguloke yathayatha bhabe'i srsti karechena [1]. Tini esaba nidarsana bisadabhabe barnana karena emana sampradayera jan'ya yara jane
